metadata.name: Tag Vocabulary
metadata.description: The Tag Vocabulary codelist defines external codelists which themselves provide codes and descriptions for tag elements.

data.name: Agrovoc
data.description: A controlled vocabulary covering all areas of interest of the Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO) of the United Nations, including food, nutrition, agriculture, fisheries, forestry, environment etc.

data.name: UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDG)
data.description: A value from the top-level list of UN sustainable development goals (SDGs) (e.g. ‘1’)

data.name: UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDG) Targets
data.description: A value from the second-level list of UN sustainable development goals (SDGs) (e.g. ‘1.1’)
